QuestData.Title: Safety First
QuestData.Description: The connection between horse and rider is fascinating to me, and I will never truly understand until I experience it.$b$bBut, well, you know... armor! How could I possibly even think to mount one of these beauties without some proper protection?$b$bI saw some waterfalls nearby. There must be shells near the banks of its pools! Would you entertain an old Tortollan by collecting some for his safety?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Durable Seashells in Rockskip Falls.
QuestData.CompletionText: Protection, yes. Can't put yourself in a dangerous situation without the proper protection!
QuestData.RewardText: Ah yes, these shells will help keep me well safeguarded!
